work.name: Express-Scripts

Introduced Unit Testing, improving development workflow.

work.name: DecHit
highlights: Instructor for DecHit React Academy. Held a few crash courses. Performed Code Reviews. Getting them up to speed with Nodejs, React & Redux in 1 month
Lead a Team of 4 developers using the MERN stack to develop a microservice based application.
Implemented CI/CD Pipelines using Gitlab, Jenkins, Docker and Kubernetes.
Maintained and improved an Angular2+ application, reducing code complexity and duplication, resulting in faster development and easier integration with the Java Backend team
Maintained a Legacy React Cordova app while introducing best practices to facilitate a transition to React Native.

work.name: Mia-Platform
work.summary: Software agency trying to bring their clients into using Cloud Native software
highlights: Worked on a cross-functional team, to develop APIs and web UI dashboards for a B2B client Foorban Srl.
Developed a microservice in Kotlin using the Ktor framework, Jackson and Retrofit2 following the BFF and Saga patterns.
Developed two React dashboards using data from the previously mentioned kotlin API and Mia's CMS.
Developed a PDF Microservice that allows the use of HTML as a familiar DSL for creating Shipping labels, receipts and custom size invoices.
Prototyped a React app for live previewing of the PDFs using the Monaco-Editor.

work.name: TXT e-Solutions
work.summary: TXT is a software agency in the field of Aerospace & Defence
highlights: Acted as a point of reference/mentor for developers learning: Node, React, Redux & Typescript.
Reduced bugs by 15% by adopting Typescript and helping coworkers get up to speed.
Lead the development of a React/Typescript web control panel for operating Flight Simulators via remotely via tablet for Leonardo SpA
Maintained c# two Xamarin Mobile apps used by ITT Inc in Automotive industry for collecting diagnostic break data transfered over wifi and low power bluetooth
Developed a c# app for collecting and processing flight data to reduce fuel costs in collaboration with IATA.
Developed a c# WPF Simulator for training the proper use of the ADRIAN system.
